c74object.name: hoa.in~
c74object.digest: signal inlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~
c74object.description: hoa.in~ defines a signal inlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

inlet.digest: output signal from a hoa.process~ object's inlet

attribute.name: comment
attribute.description: Sets a description to the inlet which will be shown in the assist inlet of the hoa.process~ that load this hoa.in~. Only works if the extra parameter is greater than 0.

attribute.name: extra
attribute.description: Defines an extra inlet. Extra inlet are added to the "normal" instance inlet and can be used to send signal to all instances.

c74object.discussion: hoa.in~ defines a signal inlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~

entry.name: Inlet 1 (signal)
entry.description: output signal from a hoa.process~ object's inlet.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: hoa.in~ defines a signal inlet for a patcher loaded by hoa.process~
